ECSchema.description: Schema policies which impose schema authoring rules.

ECCustomAttributeClass.description: If opted-in by a schema, other schemas may not define additional ECDbMap:ForeignKeyConstraint custom attributes.

ECArrayProperty.description: Navigation properties that are allowed violate against the policy. Format: {schema name}:{class name}.{property name}

ECCustomAttributeClass.description: If opted-in by a schema, other schemas may not define ECRelationshipClasses that cause new link tables to be created.

ECArrayProperty.description: Relationship classes that that are allowed to violate against the policy. Format: {schema name}:{relationship class name}

ECCustomAttributeClass.description: If opted-in by a schema, other schemas may not define entity classes that do not subclass from existing classes (mixins are excluded from this policy).

ECArrayProperty.description: Entity classes that that are allowed to violate against the policy. Format: {schema name}:{class name}
